no-route-fullscreen-exit.desc: Changing route app won't exit fullscreen

model-value.desc: Model of the component defining the current panel's name; If a Number is used, it does not define the panel's index, but rather the panel's name which can also be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use the v-model directive.

keep-alive.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native <keep-alive> component on the content

keep-alive-include.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native include prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names

keep-alive-exclude.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native exclude prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names

keep-alive-max.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native max prop for <keep-alive>

animated.desc: Enable transitions between panel (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)

infinite.desc: Makes component appear as infinite (when reaching last panel, next one will become the first one)

swipeable.desc: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)

vertical.desc: Default transitions and swipe actions will be on the vertical axis

transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

height.desc: Height of Carousel in CSS units, including unit name

padding.desc: Applies a default padding to each slide, according to the usage of 'arrows' and 'navigation' props

control-color.desc: Color name for QCarousel button controls (arrows, navigation) from the Quasar Color Palette

control-text-color.desc: Color name for text color of QCarousel button controls (arrows, navigation) from the Quasar Color Palette

control-type.desc: Type of button to use for controls (arrows, navigation)

autoplay.desc: Jump to next slide (if 'true' or val > 0) or previous slide (if val < 0) at fixed time intervals (in milliseconds); 'false' disables autoplay, 'true' enables it for 5000ms intervals

prev-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

next-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

navigation-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

navigation-active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention for the active (current slide) navigation icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

navigation-icon.desc: Slot for navigation icon/btn; Suggestion: QBtn

name.desc: The name of the corresponding slide

btnProps.desc: Default QBtn props that can be binded to your own QBtn

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component changes the model; This event _isn't_ fired if the model is changed externally; Is also used by v-model

before-transition.desc: Emitted before transitioning to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition is going

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition is happening

transition.desc: Emitted after component transitioned to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition has occurred

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition has happened

toggleFullscreen.desc: Toggle the view to be fullscreen or not fullscreen

panelName.desc: Panel's name, which may be a String or Number; Number does not refers to panel index, but to its name, which may be an Integer
